text:
Julie Beth Hagerty (born June 15, 1955) is an American actress and former model. She starred as Elaine in the movies "Airplane!" (1980) and ' (1982).
Her other movie roles include "A Midsummer Night's Sex Comedy" (1982), "Lost in America" (1985), "What About Bob?" (1991), "Freddy Got Fingered" (2001), "A Master Builder" (2014), and "Marriage Story" (2019).
